name: Twitch Chat Brawl
description:
This game is currently a Work in progress, if you find any bugs please let me know in the comments! Once all the code is fixed and commented, I'll be releasing the source code to the game.

The game does require an Oauth key to your Twitch account, this acts as a temporary access password. This information stays completely local to your system and is not sent elsewhere. If you do not feel comfortable providing this app with an Oauth key, no worries!
But do note you can remove the Oauth key from your account by:

  1. Going to https://www.twitch.tv/settings/connections
  2. Scrolling down to Other Connections
  3. Disconnecting: Twitch Chat OAuth Token Generator

After doing the above steps, the key will be completely revoked.

Tile assets used: 
  • Cavern: maaot.itch.io/mossy-cavern
  • Towers + City: guardian5.itch.io/row-house-tile-set
  • Dungeon: blackwolfdave.itch.io/forgotten-dungeon
